attributes.action: To establish a deselection mechanism for sitting Prime Ministers
attributes.background: To consider a mechanism to remove incumbent Prime Ministers at the request of a majority of the electorate

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want there to be a mechanism for the Prime Minister to be removed, but we're not sure exactly how you want this to work.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Change the law, so that UK citizens can force an immediate General Election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603106
